artefact: Tree felling licence (England, Scotland and Wales)

artefact.overview: To fell trees in England, Scotland and Wales, you may need a felling licence from the Forestry Commission
artefact.licence_short_description: Licence to fell trees in England, Scotland and Wales from the Forestry Commission.
artefact.licence_overview: To fell trees in England, Scotland and Wales, you may need a felling licence from the [Forestry Commission.](http://www.forestry.gov.uk/ "Forestry Commission"){:rel="external"} In some circumstances other permissions or exceptions may apply.
